name: Companion Member

aspects.high_concept: Honored Warrior of the Companions Brotherhood
aspects.trouble: Beast Blood Runs in Our Veins
other_aspects: May Carry the Curse of Lycanthropy

stunts: Shield-Sibling: +2 to Fight when fighting alongside another Companion
Warrior's Pride: +2 to Provoke when challenged about honor or combat prowess
Beast Form (some): If a werewolf, can transform once per session into beast form (gain +3 to all physical skills but lose mental acuity)

trust_clock.description: Brotherhood bond - grows through shared battles and completing Companions quests

notes: The Companions are Skyrim's most renowned warrior guild, descended from Ysgramor's legendary 500. They take contracts for protection, monster hunting, and combat support. Many members are secretly werewolves, having accepted Hircine's gift through the Circle. They value honor, martial prowess, and brotherhood. Members can become loyal companions and allies to proven warriors.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct, values strength, uses warrior metaphors, honorable speech
quirks: May have tells when full moon approaches

combat_tactics: Companions fight with aggressive, honorable tactics. They prefer melee combat and direct confrontation. Those with beast blood may transform if the battle is desperate. They never abandon shield-siblings and fight to protect their brothers and sisters.
